4.name: Sol
4.text: "Ooooo... This is a tavern... A world unknown..."

5.name: Eric
5.text:
"Yeah. It has a pretty good atmosphere, right?
And... oh, there you are. Hey! Mark-kun!"

6.name: Adventurer
6.text:
"Oh? Eric, huh. What's up? Do you have some free
time today? And also, over there... oh?"

7.name: Eric
7.text:
"This girl is the golden dragon that Eni-sensei
raised! Her name is Sol-chan!"

8.name: Adventurer
8.text:
"Oh, this one is that... It's taking on a human
form, but it's a golden dragon. Amazing."**

9.name: Eric
9.text:
"The first time I saw her... it's like, how should
I put it? Even though she's a powerful dragon,
she's incredibly cute!!"

11.name: Eric
11.text:
"She's like a friendly and silly dog from the
neighborhood, you know?"

14.name: Eric
14.text:
"So, like I was saying. If you're free, Mark-kun,
why don't you help out? Fighting alongside a
golden dragon would be the best for someone
aspiring to be a lord, right?"

15.name: Adventurer
15.text:
"Don't just assume I have free time. Well, I do
consider myself to belong to the domain of good.
If a golden dragon asks for help, I will gladly
assist."

16.name: Sol
16.text:
"T-Then, Mark-kun, please!! Please lend me your
strength!!"

17.name: Adventurer
17.text:
"Ah, I'm Mark. I'm aiming to be a lord, but for
now, I'm a warrior. Nice to meet you, little
dragon lady."

28.name: Minstrel
28.text:
"The heroic Magmedol gallantly drew his sword and
declared, 'Behold, our god! Tonight shall be a
feast of slaughter───' Oh, the princess was moved
to tears by those words..."

30.name: Minstrel
30.text:
"Oh, Magmedol-sama, you are the true hero...
Please, take me with you... But Magmedol did not
look back... He has a great oath... With the
weeping princess behind him, the great hero
Magmedol departed..."

33.name: Narration
33.text:
The minstrel finished singing, and the satisfied
audience left. And what remained in that place was
a silver-haired beauty, still deeply moved by the
poem, murmuring "precious" with a sorrowful
expression. Upon closer inspection, a silver tail
extended from her waist...

35.name: Isk
35.text:
"Um, are you okay...? ...Ah, could it be, Sol-
sama...? The Gold Dragon, Sol-sama...?"

36.name: Sol
36.text: "Y-Yes! I'm Sol!! Um... and you are...??"

37.name: Isk
37.text:
"I am Iskvoler. I am a Silver Dragon. It is my
greatest joy to listen to and collect stories from
the human world..."

38.name: Sol
38.text:
"Ohhhhh... Silver Dragon-san!!!! This is my first
time meeting someone from the same species!!!
Ohhhhh...!!!"

40.name: Isk
40.text:
"Rukurea Village is a very nice village... I also
wish to stay in this village for a little
while..."

41.name: Isk
41.text:
"I have heard from Eni-sensei... that this village
is Sol-sama's territory, correct...? If so, I
would like to pay my respects... It would be rude
for an outsider dragon to wander around the
territory without greeting and potentially offend
you..."

42.name: Sol
42.text:
"Oh, from Sensei! So that's what it was!! Nice to
meet you too, Isk-san! Let's be friends!! Ehehe~"

43.name: Isk
43.text:
"Friends... yes, that's right... Comrades,
indeed... Let's get along, Sol-sama. Yes... I'm
happy..."
